original: longs spyod rnams dkon mchog dang pha ma dang bla ma dang sdug bsngal ba rnams la zad par bya bar bsam zhing zad par yang bya'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rnams dkon mchog dang pha ma dang bla ma dang sdug bsngal ba rnams la zad par bya bar bsam zhing zad par yang bya'o //
translated: One should think and act to exhaust one's wealth on the Three Jewels, one's parents, one's gurus, and the suffering,

original: gzhan du na 'grub pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'grub pa med do //
translated: otherwise one will not succeed.

original: nan tur du bya bar rigs pas nan tur du byed na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor la gnas pas spra tshil las byas pa'i mtshan ma rab tu 'dra ba la dug dang tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag gis byugs
analyzed: nan tur du bya bar rigs pas nan tur du byed na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor la gnas pas spra tshil las byas pa'i mtshan ma rab tu 'dra ba la dug dang tsha ba gsum dang ske tshe dang tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag gis byugs
translated: If it is proper to punish, and one punishes, then abiding in the yoga of Vajra Humkara, one should make a likeness of the target out of beeswax, and anoint it with poison, the three hot spices, black mustard seed, hot oil, and blood.

original: la de'i sngags zlos @64a * //
analyzed: la de'i sngags zlos @64a * //
translated: Recite the mantra of that deity.

original: pas dur khrod kyi me la gdungs na zhag bdun gyis mngon sum du ci 'dod pa ster ro //
analyzed: pas dur khrod kyi me la gdungs na zhag bdun gyis mngon sum du ci 'dod pa ster ro //
translated: If one heats it in the fire of a charnel ground for seven days, it will grant whatever one desires.

original: de nas bzod par gsol la mtshan ma gnas dben par bzhag ste /
analyzed: de nas bzod par gsol la mtshan ma gnas dben par bzhag ste /
translated: Then, having asked for forbearance, one should place the sign in an isolated place

original: rdzas dang dbral bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdzas dang dbral bar bya'o //
translated: and separate it from the substances.

original: nan tur gyis sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: nan tur gyis sgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the practice through coercion.

original: da ni mnyes par bya bas thabs gzhan bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni mnyes par bya bas thabs gzhan bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, I will explain the other method through pleasing.

original: gser dngul lam zangs lcags kyi shog bu la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gnyis byas la /
analyzed: gser dngul lam zangs lcags kyi shog bu la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa gnyis byas la /
translated: One should make two eight-petaled lotuses out of gold, silver, copper, or iron.

original: gcig la snga ma lta bu'i lha dgu bya //
analyzed: gcig la snga ma lta bu'i lha dgu bya //
translated: On one, one should draw the nine deities as before.

original: gcig la lha mo dgu bri zhing de nas rab gnas byas la de gnyis kha sbyar bas mnyes par bsams la mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ras dril la za ma tog ser pos bkang ba'i dbus su stsal te mandala khru brgyad pa /
analyzed: gcig la lha mo dgu bri zhing de nas rab gnas byas la de gnyis kha sbyar bas mnyes par bsams la mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ras dril la za ma tog ser pos bkang ba'i dbus su stsal te mandala khru brgyad pa /
translated: On the other, one should draw the nine goddesses. Then, having consecrated them, one should imagine that they are pleased by joining the two. One should wrap them in ghee, honey, and sugar, place them in the center of a yellow box, and cover it with a yellow cloth.

original: gru bzhi pa byi dor legs par byas la me tog ser po bkram pa'i dbus su za ma tog bzhag la dus gsum du mchod pa bya ba dang bstod pa dang / bskor ba dang bzlas pa byas na dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang ster na dngos grub phal pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: gru bzhi pa byi dor legs par byas la me tog ser po bkram pa'i dbus su za ma tog bzhag la dus gsum du mchod pa bya ba dang bstod pa dang / bskor ba dang bzlas pa byas na dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang ster na dngos grub phal pa lta ci smos /
translated: Having well cleaned a square [area], having strewn yellow flowers, one should place a coffer in the middle, and make offerings, praise, circumambulate, and recite [mantras] three times a day. If one does this, [the deity] will grant even the eight great accomplishments, let alone common accomplishments.
